title: Brad Branson Rapid Persuasion
description:
Table Of Contents/ List Of Topics Covered:
Module 1: Introduction
- The art of persuasion without using words
- How to build trust and get people to agree with you
- NLP crash course and using it to manipulate minds
- Using hypnotic techniques to influence peopleâ€™s beliefs
- Creating winning scenarios using negotiation techniques and hypnosis
- Problems why you are being taught the wrong way to influence women
- What persuasion really is and using it to upgrade your life and social circle
- A strategy for learning your bad emotions triggers and self regulating them 
- Becoming more assertive, dominant, and influential by understanding your negative past

Module 2: Persuasion Equation
- How to increase your self-esteem
- How to increase your alpha male in interactions
- How to control a conversation with word usage
- A tool for determining the value of your friendships
- Analyzing your beliefs through focused value to develop confidence
- Building rapport, getting others to open up, and obtaining the reaction you want
- Using body language, and emotional mindset, and physical state to convey confidence
- Uncovering a personâ€™s mental blueprint through communication and their reading behavior

Module 3: Social Network
- Learn how to smoothly go for the close
- How to develop cool guy personality traits
- An action plan to turn successful acquaintances into your friends
- Re-initiate conversations by learning to break out of spectator mode
- Eliminating past negative family behaviors and improving your self esteem
- Learn how to reframe your value proposition in order to expand your social circle
- Surrounding yourself with successful friends who emotionally invested in your success

Module 4: Dating Life
- Six mental reframes to feel deserving of women
- A mindset to build attraction without appearing weird
- Taking your relationship to the next level by â€œearning the language of love
- Reinforcing your mindsets in order to become a great conversationalist
- How meeting lots of girls can have a negative impact on long-term relationships
- Applying â€œmodalities of thoughtâ€ from confident areas of your life onto new situations 
- How to respond to a womanâ€™s behavior by mastering important calibration techniques
- Decoding how a women thinks and using it to flirt, build sexual tension, or move the relationship forward

Module 5: Career & Business
- How to become a better networker
- Creating a great identity for your business
- Using the â€œhot girl frameâ€ to sculpt an attractive resume
- How to prepare early in life to demand greater income later in life
- Strategies that motivate you to be more assertive in your business
- Become a company asset by developing your personal brand
- Building trust and relationships where people want to pay for your products
- Explanation of true marketing and applying it to business, career, or to increase income
